metadata.title: CVE-2022-4427 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in OTRS AG OTRS, OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition allows SQL Injection via TicketSearch Webservice This issue affects OTRS: from 7.0.1 before 7.0.40 Patch 1, from 8.0.1 before 8.0.28 Patch 1; ((OTRS)) Community Edition: from 6.0.1 through 6.0.34.

criterions.comment: znuny package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
